title: Gen-AI Developer Internship
description: Build prototypes and internal tools using LLMs (OpenAI, Claude, open-source models, etc.). Train and fine-tune AI models using Python, LangChain, HuggingFace, or similar frameworks.
requirements: Recent college graduate or final year student
Experience with Python and AI/ML frameworks
Knowledge of LLMs and prompt engineering
Passion for AI and startup environment
responsibilities: Build prototypes and internal tools using LLMs
Create and test prompt engineering strategies
Contribute to product development and documentation

title: Full Stack & DevOps Intern
description: Build and maintain full-stack web applications and work with cloud infrastructure. Get hands-on experience with real Gen-AI systems and modern DevOps practices.
requirements: Final year student or recent college graduate
Experience with React.js, Node.js, or Python
Basic knowledge of cloud platforms (AWS, GCP)
Familiarity with Git and CI/CD concepts
responsibilities: Build full-stack web applications using React.js, Node.js, or Python
Design APIs and integrate with Gen-AI services
Automate CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions and Docker
Configure cloud infrastructure on AWS, GCP, or Render
Work with Linux systems and container orchestration
